posts.post_content:
Would like to once again own a PSA 9 T206. I've owned a number of them over the years. I'm looking for a full-bordered example (too many skinny ones out there in old holders), and no qualifiers. 

I have significant T206 cards for potential trade.

Thank you for looking...PM me.

Michael
I remember the PSA 10 you once owned.:)

Hi Barry!

Any PSA 9's out there? Some nice trade bait available.
